body_html:
@michaelisard Hi Michael, thanks for your reply!
Yes, memory matters. I tried "bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --local_resources 8096,.5,1.0 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package", and it managed to build. But it took 3 hours to build... Do you have any suggestion to speed up?
My machine has 16G RAM and 12G GPU memory. Thanks!
